RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: select country_code, description from sttm_country where auth_stat = 'A' and record_stat = 'O'
select lang_code , lang_name from smtbs_language WHERE AUTH_STAT='A' and record_stat = 'O'
select country_code, description from sttm_country where auth_stat = 'A' and record_stat = 'O'

RAD_SUMMARY.TITLE: LBL_SUMMARY_DETAILS
RAD_SUMMARY.RAD_SUMMARY_WHERECLAUSE: ((ACCESS_GROUP IS NOT NULL AND ACCESS_GROUP IN (SELECT ACCESS_GROUP FROM STVW_USER_ACCESS B WHERE B.USER_ID = global.user_id AND B.ACCESS_GROUP = ACCESS_GROUP)) OR ACCESS_GROUP IS NULL) AND (SMPKS_MASK_USER.pr_setusrctx(global.user_id,'STSCIFCR' ) IN ('N','Y')) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM sttms_cust_forget_detail FC WHERE process_status = 'P' AND FC.customer_no = STVW_STTM_CORE_CUSTOMER.customer_no)
RAD_SUMMARY.RAD_MULTIBRN_WHERECLAUSE: (SMPKS_MASK_USER.pr_setusrctx(global.user_id,'STSCIFCR' ) IN ('N','Y')) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM sttms_cust_forget_detail FC WHERE process_status = 'P' AND FC.customer_no = STVW_STTM_CORE_CUSTOMER.customer_no)

RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: select cust_cat, cust_cat_desc from sttms_customer_cat where auth_stat = 'A' and record_stat = 'O'
SELECT ECA_SYSTEM FROM STTM_ECA_SYSTEM WHERE ONCE_AUTH = 'Y' AND RECORD_STAT = 'O'

select ACCESS_GROUP, description from STTMS_ACCESS_GROUP a where EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM stvw_user_access b WHERE b.user_id = global.user_id and b.access_group = a.access_group) and auth_stat = 'A' and record_stat = 'O'
